global.name: non
global.subject: Sijè
global.versionNumberIsAvailableOnTheAppStore: vèsyon %{versionCode} ki disponib nan AppStore la.
global.biometryIsNotSupported: Byometrik otantifikasyon pa sipòte sou aparèy sa a!
global.biometricChangeError: Biometric authentication is disabled due a change in biometric data or system settings on your device. Please re-enable biometric authentication by manually going to Settings -> Security -> Biometric Authentication
global.thisMayTakeFewSeconds: Sa gen dwa pran kèk segond ...
global.tooManyAttempts: Twòp tantativ echwe. Tanpri eseye ankò nan %{after} minit.
global.passcodeAttemptExceed: Limit tantativ paskod depase, tanpri eseye ankò pita.
global.autoWipeAlert: Ou te mal eseye déblotché app a %{times} fwa, apre 1 tantativ plis san siksè, yo pral app a Reyajiste ak tout done kont ou yo pral pèdi.
global.cannotValidateCurrentTimeWithServer: Pa ka senkronize tan aplikasyon an ak tan sèvè. Asire ou ke ou konekte ak entènèt la!
global.pleaseAddAccountToSignTheTransaction: Tanpri ajoute yon kont pou siyen tranzaksyon an
global.noSpendableAccountIsAvailableForSendingP: Kounye a pa gen okenn balans ki disponib pou voye peman yo.
global.pleaseCheckSessionLogForMoreInfo: Please check the session logs for more info!
global.signedTransactionDetectedSubmit: Siyen tranzaksyon detekte, soumèt bay Ledger la?
global.weNeedYourPermissionToUseYourCamera: Nou bezwen pèmisyon ou pou itilize kamera ou
global.looksLikeYouAreOffline: Sanble ou offline (pa gen koneksyon entènèt)
global.unableToConnectToXRPLNodePleaseCheckYour: Kapab konekte nan ne XRPL, Tanpri tcheke koneksyon entènèt ou epi eseye ankò
global.thisAccountIsReportedAsScamOrFraudulentA: Kont sa a rapòte kòm tronpe oswa adrès fo. Tanpri kontinye ak prekosyon
global.biometricIsNotAvailable: Biometrik (anprent oswa ID figi) pa disponib. Si aparèy ou an sipòte otantifikasyon byometrik, tanpri konfigirasyon li an premye (anviwònman OS).
global.pushErrorPermissionMessage: Kapab enskri notifikasyon pouse. Pou bay pèmisyon notifikasyon obligatwa a, tanpri ale nan anviwònman sistèm ou an epi asire ke XUMM> Notifikasyon yo pèmèt.
global.thePasswordYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: Modpas ou antre a pa kòrèk. Pou siyen yon tranzaksyon, ou bezwen antre nan modpas la dwa. Ou te antre modpas sa a lè ou te ajoute kont lan ou vle siyen ak XUMM.
global.thePasscodeYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: Paskod ou antre a pa kòrèk. Pou siyen yon tranzaksyon, ou bezwen antre nan paskod dwat la. Ou te antre nan paskod sa a lè ou konfigirasyon XUMM la pou premye fwa.
global.noResultFound: Pa gen rezilta yo te jwenn
global.unableToFetchCurrencyRate: Kapab chache pousantaj lajan, tanpri asire w ke ou konekte ak entènèt la
global.theAmountIsTooSmallToDisplay: Kantite lajan an twò piti yo dwe parèt: %{amount}
global.xAppWantsToOpenURLNotice:
'%{xapp}' xApp vle louvri URL sa a.
%{url}
global.transactionFeeIsNotSet: Transaction fee is not set, please wait until transaction fee is set and try again!
global.unableToSetAccountSequence: Unable to set account Sequence, please check that you are connected to the internet.
global.unableToGetLastClosedLedger: Unable to get last closed ledger, please check you are connected to the internet.
global.hookFeeNotice: Note: The total transaction fee includes a %{hookFee} %{nativeAsset} hooks fee.
global.unableToLoadNetworkFee: Unable to load the network fee!

Do NOT close Xaman
Do NOT lock your device

onboarding.slideOne_title:
Peman ak
demann peman
sou Ledger XRP la
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: Ajoute plizyè kont, nan mòd aksè konplè, oswa li sèlman. Voye tranzaksyon ak siyen demann ak kont aksè konplè ou.
onboarding.slideThree_desc: Aplikasyon an Xumm ak platfòm yo bati ak sekirite kòm yon priyorite. Pa janm antre nan sekrè ou ankò, siyen tranzaksyon soti nan aparèy pwòp ou a, ou fè konfyans.
onboarding.slideFour_desc: Ou ka voye ak resevwa XRP ak lòt marqueur ou fè konfyans tou

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: Nou itilize paskod la pou fèmen app a, konfime anviwònman ak kenbe kont ou an sekirite.
setupPasscode.repeatPasscode: Tanpri repete nouvo paskod ou an
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: Ou pral bezwen paskod ou a déblotché app a
setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: Kapab nan magazen paskod la. Sa pa ta dwe rive. Yo te voye yon rapò ensèk nan ekip sipò Xaman. Tanpri kontakte nou nan support@xumm.app pou plis enfòmasyon.
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: The selected passcode is easy to guess. We recommend you to choose a stronger one.

setupBiometry.useBiometry: Sèvi ak figiID oswa anprent dijital?
setupBiometry.biometryDescription: Pou fè kont ou pi an sekirite, ou ka aktive Otantifikasyon Biyometrik la (FigiID / ManyenID).

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: Nou itilize notifikasyon pouse pou voye demann siy

setupTermOfService.XamanNotCustodialExplain:
Xaman se yon bous ki pa gen prizon, sa vle di fon ou yo pa nan prizon Xaman, men 'ap viv' sou XRP Ledger la.

Se sèlman ou ka jwenn aksè nan fon ou ak sekrè kont ou, menm jan pwodwi pa Xaman oswa enpòte nan Xaman.

Sa vle di Xaman ak ekip Xaman lan pa ka jwenn aksè epi yo pa ka refè lajan ou si ou fè yon erè oswa pèdi kle sekrè ou yo.
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
Se sèlman ou, lè l sèvi avèk sekrè kont ou (yo) ka jwenn aksè nan lajan ou.

Ou menm ak ou pou kont ou responsab pou kenbe yo an sekirite, offline.

Ekri sovgad ou yo nan plizyè kote offline.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: Mwen pral kenbe kle sekrè mwen an san danje epi offline.
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
Xaman pa ka retounen tranzaksyon, oswa refè lajan si ou fè yon erè.

Tranzaksyon yo enstantane ak irevokabl.
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: Mwen responsab pou kenbe kle ak fon mwen an sekirite
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedger: Lajan ou 'ap viv' sou Ledger XRP la
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
Xaman se yon aplikasyon kliyan XRP Ledger.

Sa vle di XRP ou pa abite nan Xaman men sou XRP Ledger la.

Tranzaksyon voye ak resevwa yo voye ak resevwa ap viv sou / pa Ledger XRP la.
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: Lajan mwen yo anrejistre sou Ledger XRP a, pa andedan Xaman
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
Xaman ak depatman sipò Xaman PAP JANM mande sekrè ou

Si yon moun fè, oswa mande ou antre nan sekrè ou yon kote, yo te scammed ou.

Tanpri kontakte nou ak enfòmasyon ke ou genyen sou ensidan an.
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: Mwen pap janm bay sekrè mwen bay pèsonn e mwen pap janm antre ladan l yon lòt kote
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: Lè ou jwenn yon lòt telefòn (nouvo / ranplasman), pou rezon sekirite, Xaman ap mande ou enpòte tout kont ou lè l sèvi avèk sekrè yo kont ankò.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: Mwen pral kenbe sekrè mwen an san danje, offline, se konsa mwen ka re-antre nan yo si mwen jwenn yon nouvo telefòn
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Si ou gen kesyon, ou ka li FAQ yo epi poze kesyon nan https://support.xumm.app.

Sa a se sèl chanèl konfyans pou sipò XUMM.
setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXamanSupportTeam: Mwen pral sèlman fè konfyans repons nan ekip sipò Xaman nan https://support.xumm.app
setupTermOfService.pleaseReadTheTextAboveCarefully: Tanpri li tèks ki anwo a ak anpil atansyon

home.youDonNotHaveOtherAssets: Ou pa gen okenn lòt (ki pa %{nativeAsset}) marqueur
home.howActivateMyAccount: Kouman mwen ka aktive kont mwen an?
home.otherAssetsDesc: Ledger XRP la tou pèmèt ou kenbe balans nan, epi voye ak resevwa, marqueur lòt pase XRP. Jton sa yo ka pibliye pa lòt kont sou Ledger XRP la. Si ou vle pou kapab voye oswa resevwa yon siy ki pa Peye-XRP, ou pral oblije fè konfyans konpayi a ki pa Peye-XRP siy la.
home.nativeAssetYouOwnVsYourSpendableBalance: %{nativeAsset} ou posede vs balans spendable ou.
home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: Li yon ti kras vid isit la ajoute premye kont ou.
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: Èske ou posede kle yo nan kont sa a Li sèlman oswa èske sa a kont echanj ou a?
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: Ou pa ka depoze dirèkteman nan kont echanj ou: ou bezwen yon tag destinasyon pou fè sa. Tanpri jwenn tag destinasyon ou nan echanj ou, epi depoze manyèlman.

account.addAccountDescription: Enpòte kont ki egziste deja ou, oswa kreye yon nouvo kont.
account.importExisting: Enpòte yon kont ki egziste deja
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Tanpri bay nimewo yo, sa a se pou pwòp sekirite ou: nou vle ou konfime ou ekri li desann.
account.invalidSecretNumber: Kle nimewo sekrè ki pa valab antre
account.YouJustCreatedAccount: Ou fèk kreye yon nouvo kont fre.
account.PleaseEnterYourPasswordForAccount: Tanpri antre modpas ou pou kont
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: Kreye yon modpas longè pwolonje ki fasil pou sonje, men enposib pou lòt moun devine.
account.passwordShouldContain: Fòs modpas ou ta dwe omwen san Patipri, tanpri itilize yon modpas long oswa pi difisil (pi long se pi bon).
account.passwordConfirmNotMatch: Modpas ou antre yo pa matche ak
account.chooseWisely: Tanpri chwazi nivo sekirite ki kostim kont sa a
account.passcodeOptionDesc: Sa a se ideyal pou depans chak jou. Ou ka siyen tranzaksyon pa senpleman montre figi ou, analysis dwèt ou oswa k ap antre nan paskod ou.
account.passwordOptionDesc: Opsyon sa a se pi bon pou depo long tèm nan XRP ak marqueur ak mande pou yon modpas yo siyen tranzaksyon yo
account.hereIsYourPublicKeyConfirm: Isit la nan adrès kont derive ou.
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Isit la nan nouvo kont ou. Ou kapab kounye a resevwa lajan nan adrès kont piblik la pwodwi.
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: Adrès kont kopye nan presse-papiers la
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Ekri tout ranje yo sou yon moso papye epi kenbe l yon kote an sekirite! Si aparèy ou an aksidan epi ou pa gen nimewo sekrè yo ankò, lajan ou yo PÈDI.
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: Se sèlman ou ki ka manyen lajan ou, men ou pral gen kenbe nimewo sekrè ou an sekirite. Sekrè ou konsiste de 8 ranje (ki make A-H) ki gen 6 chif pou chak ranje.
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Pa janm pataje nimewo sekrè ou yo (kle prive) ak yon lòt moun. Si ou fè sa, ou ka pèdi aksè nan fon ou yo.
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Èske ou sèten ou vle tounen?
(Nenpòt entrain antre yo pral otorize pou rezon sekirite)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
Èske ou sèten ou vle tounen?
(ou dwe re-ranpli tout entrain yo pou rezon sekirite)
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: ou Tangem Kat ou an pa gen yon kont XRP Ledger ankò. Pou itilize kat sa a, yon kont ap gen pou pwodwi pa kat la.
account.tangemLongTapExplain: Mekanis sa a pwoteje kat la kont atak pwoksimite: li pral ranfòse yon reta ant resepsyon ak ekzekisyon nan kòmandman.
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: Anvan ekzekisyon an nan nenpòt ki lòd qui yon chanjman nan eta a nan kat la, ou pral gen antre nan paskod la.
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: Before the execution of any command, you will have to enter the access code.
account.cardSecuritySuccessfullyChangedTo: sekirite Kat avèk siksè chanje a %{security}.
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: Sèvi ak Tangem kat mande pou kapasite NFC. Telefòn ou pa sanble sipòte NFC.
account.fullAccessDesc: Voye, siyen epi resevwa tranzaksyon yo
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: Ou ka mete ajou yon kont li sèlman nan yon kont aksè konplè pita sou
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
Tanpri bay adrès kont ou
(Kòmanse ak 'r ...')
account.pleaseEnterAllWords: Tanpri antre tout mo mnemonik ou yo!
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Tanpri bay Mnemonik ou (24 mo) pou kont ou.
account.pleaseEnterYourSecretNumber: Tanpri antre nimewo sekrè ou yo
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: Kle prive HEX ki pa valab! Kle prive HEX yo ta dwe 66 karaktè HEX (A-F, 0-9) long.
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Tanpri bay sekrè kont ou / Grenn fanmi an.
account.pleaseEnterYourFamilySeed: Tanpri antre pitit pitit fanmi ou
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Tanpri antre yon non pou kont sa a (egzanp 'Depans' oswa 'Ekonomi').
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Chanje soti nan Li sèlman nan mòd Aksè konplè yo pral mande pou ou antre nan kle sekrè pou kont ou
account.getStartedCreateAccount: Jwenn te kòmanse pa ajoute premye kont ou.
account.accountSettingsDescription: Ou ka edite anviwònman kont ou oswa etikèt kont isit la.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: Ou ap amelyore nivo aksè ou. Ou bezwen enpòte kle prive ou pou kont sa a.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: Ou ap degrade nivo aksè kont ou. Lè w fè sa, chanje kont ou an yon kont Li sèlman, menm jan XUMM pral pirifye entèn, dosye chiffres kle sekrè ou an. Ou kapab sèlman jwenn aksè nan fon ou ankò lè ou enpòte kle sekrè ou ankò. Se sèlman kontinye si ou sèten ou gen yon backup offline nan kle sekrè ou pou kont sa a.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: Ou ap degradation nivo aksè ou yo. Èske ou sèten?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: Ou ap retire siy sa a nan kont XRP Ledger ou. Èske ou sèten?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Chanje nivo sekirite a pa disponib kounye a
account.accountRemoveWarning: Kont ou pral efase pou tout tan nan Xaman. Èske ou sèten?
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: Etikèt kont yo ta dwe mwens pase 16 karaktè!
account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: Kont chwazi a pa aktive. Pou siyen tranzaksyon sa a ou bezwen chwazi yon kont aktive!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xaman as a full access account.

%{address}
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: Sekrè a antre nan ki dwe nan yon lòt r-adrès. Si ou vle enpòte yon kle regilye, tanpri [Enpòte nouvo kont]. Si ou pa, tanpri [anile] epi tcheke antre ou.
account.toTheseExistingAccounts: Pou sa / sa yo ki deja egziste kont (yo)
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: Mèt kle pou kont sa a enfim ak regilye kont kle yo pa jwenn nan lis kont!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: Regilye kle pou kont sa a pa te enpòte ak aksè siy!
account.currentPasswordShouldNotBeEmpty: Modpas aktyèl la pa ta dwe vid!
account.yourAccountPasswordChangedSuccessfully: Modpas kont ou chanje avèk siksè!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: Ou se tout mete! Ou kapab kounye a ale nan pwochen etap la.
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: Tranzaksyon an DEKAPAB kle prive pou kont lan. Sa ka fèmen ou deyò. Se sèlman kontinye si ou se absoliman asire w ke sa a se sa ou vle, epi ou konnen ki sa w ap fè.
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert: Si ou konsidere enpòte kont mnemonik ou pandan y ap kont ou kenbe valè enpòtan (egzanp. Ekonomi ou, pi gwo kantite XRP oswa lòt marqueur), tanpri konsidere kreye yon nouvo kont nan Xaman kenbe kont mnemonik ou offline olye.
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning:
Li pa posib pou enpòte kont Echanj (depo) ou an. Fè sa pa pèmèt ou swiv balans pwòp ou a sou echanj la.

Enpòte yon kont li sèlman travay sèlman si sa a se pwòp ou a, aktive kont, tankou kont lan nan bous kenkayri ou.
account.deleteAccountWarning: Sa a se yon tranzaksyon Kont efase. Lè w ap siyen kont ou yo pral efase, ak tout lajan ki rete ou (eksepte pou dènye %{ownerReserve}  rezève XRP a, kòm frè a sou Ledger  XRP pou efase yon kont se %{ownerReserve} XRP) yo pral voye nan destinasyon an configuré. Tanpri tcheke destinasyon an de fwa, epi kontinye sèlman si ou aktyèlman vle efase kont ou sou liv XRP la
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: Ou pa ka efase kont sa a, paske li gen espesifik objè XRP Ledger, tankou marqueur (ki pa XRP), Dezentralize Echanj (DEX) ofri, kondisyonèl (kòm yon kreyatè oswa benefisyè)
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: Kont sa poko ka efase. Li pran %{remainingSequence} plis liv pou fèmen anvan kont sa a ka efase.
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Kapab tcheke pou objè kont, tanpri asire w ke ou konekte ak ne XRP Ledger
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Kapab chache sekans aktyèl la. Tanpri, asire w ke ou konekte ak ne XRP Ledger la.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Kapab jwenn enfòmasyon kont destinasyon, tanpri asire w ke ou konekte ak ne XRP Ledger
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: Kont destinasyon pa aktive, Dwe gen yon kont finanse nan liv XRP la.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Destinasyon Adrès mande pou yon Tag Destinasyon
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: Kont destinasyon ak sous pa ka menm.
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: Aktivasyon kont se yon kondisyon sou Ledger XRP la. Pou aktive, ou pral oblije fè yon premye depo omwen %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: Ou enpòte yon nouvo kont sou Ledger XRP la. Kont lan pa aktive. Aktivasyon kont se yon kondisyon sou Ledger XRP la. Pou aktive, ou pral oblije fè yon premye depo omwen %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: Premye %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} depoze nan kont ou pa ka depanse, men yo pral rezève pou kenbe kont ou aktif epi peye pou frè Ledger.
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: %{nativeAsset} rezève ou a pa pral parèt kòm balans nan Xaman, men ou ka wè rezèv ou a ak bouton "Eksplike balans mwen an" nan ekran kay la, pi wo a balans %{nativeAsset} ou an.
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress:
Adrès sa a parèt tankou yon adrès echanj, èske ou sèten ou vle kontinye?

Ou pa janm ka voye nan adrès sa a san ou pa respekte enstriksyon echanj ou an.
account.accountDestroyWarning: Kont ou pral efase nèt, eske ou sèten?
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Kapab kache kont sa a. Omwen yon kont yo ta dwe vizib.
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Tape epi kenbe sou yon atik reorganize pa priyorite a vle
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: Pou vire sekrè ou nan yon kont XRP Ledger, tanpri antre nan sekrè ou.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountIsGoingToBe: Kont XRP Ledger ou a pral:
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
Si ou kontinye, ou pral enpòte yon kont XRP Ledger soti nan nimewo sekrè. Nimewo sekrè yo ta dwe pwodwi ** pa ou ** lè l sèvi avèk yon metòd offline (egzanp. Ak zo). Ou ** dwe ** te estoke nimewo sekrè pwodwi ou yo (pa egzanp. Mete so an metal, ekri).
SELMAN KONTINYE SI OU KONNEN SA WAP FE.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning:
Pandan ke ou ajoute yon paskod nan kat ou amelyore sekirite nan fon ou nan ka ta gen yon pèdi (epi yo te jwenn) kat, li enpòtan reyalize ke lajan ou yo pral inaksesib epi yo ka * PA * dwe rekipere (pa nenpòt moun) si ou pa ' pa sonje paskod ou.

Èske ou reyèlman asire w ke ou vle ajoute yon paskod sou kat ou a?
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.thereAreAccountsEligibleToSign: There are %{signersCount} accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify your Tangem cards is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your XRP Ledger account & funds will not be touched.
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES512 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.

send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: Kantite lajan sa a pi gwo pase sa ou ka depanse (%{spendable})
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: Kantite maksimòm ou ka voye a se %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: Émetteur a nan %{currency} chaje yon Frè Transfè. Kantite maksimòm ou ka voye (respekte Frè Transfè a) se %{spendable} %{currency}
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Balans ou a pa ase pou kouvri frè a (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Sous ak adrès destinasyon an pa kapab menm!
send.enterANameOrAddress: Mete yon non oswa yon adrès
send.transferredSuccessfully: Tranzaksyon ou te anrejistre avèk siksè sou Ledger XRP la.
send.verificationFailedDescription:
Your transaction has been signed and submitted successfully, however, we could not confirm transaction finality.

This can be caused by an internet connection hiccup or increased load on the XRP Ledger node you are connected to.

Please manually verify if this transaction shows in your transaction history (Events).
send.submittingToLedger: Voye tranzaksyon ou nan Ledger XRP la
send.pleaseEnterTheDestinationTag: Tanpri antre nan tag destinasyon an
send.invalidDestinationTag: QR-kòd la pa gen yon Tag Destinasyon valab. Tanpri tcheke QR-kòd la tcheke epi eseye ankò
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: Se kont lan destinasyon konfime kòm tronpe
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: Kont destinasyon an make kòm gwo risk
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: Kont lan chwazi pa sipòte siy la chwazi.
send.memoPublicWarning: Enfòmasyon sou memo yo pral piblik pou tout moun
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: Kont destinasyon an pa te itilize anvan, epi li pa gen yon balans. Pou aktive yon kont sou Ledger XRP a, yo mande yon premye depo omwen %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning: Kont destinasyon an pa te itilize anvan, epi li pa gen okenn balans. Si ou kontinye voye kont sa a, %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} nan %{amount} XRP a pral itilize pou aktive kont lan sou Ledger XRP a, sa vle di %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} pap depanse. Èske ou sèten ou vle kontinye?
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: Kont lan destinasyon pa aktive kòm li pa kenbe Ledger XRP fè respekte restriksyon balans minimòm de %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}. Pou aktive yon kont sou Ledger XRP a, yo dwe voye yon premye depo omwen %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} nan kont lan. Ki pa Peye-XRP marqueur pa ka itilize pou depo inisyal la.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: se tag nan destinasyon obligatwa pou voye peman sa a.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: Kapab jwenn enfòmasyon kont moun k ap resevwa a tanpri eseye ankò.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: Se kont lan destinasyon mete kòm twou nwa, voye nan kont sa a ap lakòz pèdi voye XRP.
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Adrès sa a egzije yon etikèt destinasyon
send.pleaseEnterAmount: Tanpri antre kantite lajan tranzaksyon an
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT:
Kapab voye siy la bay moun k ap resevwa a.
Moun k ap resevwa a pa gen yon KonfyansLiy pou konfigirasyon siy sa a bay moun ki bay siy sa a.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm: Ou ap voye nan yon kont ak tag destinasyon. Tanpri double tcheke tag destinasyon an: si ou voye nan tag ki mal la, ou pral bezwen sipò nan destinasyon an rekipere lajan ou.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowNativeAssetFlag: Kont destinasyon an endike ke li pa vle resevwa peman %{nativeAsset}. Se sèlman peman ki pa %{nativeAsset} ka voye nan destinasyon sa a.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: Kapab voye peman an kounye a akòz mank lajan likid sikile.
send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: se anba envestigasyon. Tanpri anile tranzaksyon sa a.
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: Pou kontinye (pa rekòmande) bay yon rezon nan pwòp mo ou:
send.pleaseEnterYourReasonToContinue: Tanpri antre rezon ou pou kontinye

asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: Chwazi yon konpayi epi chwazi siy la ou ta renmen ajoute. Lis sa a konsève pa ekip Xaman lan.
asset.successRemoved: Jeton yo te retire avèk siksè nan kont ou
asset.failedRemove: Erè: siy la pa t 'kapab retire!
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: TrustLine sa a toujou gen yon vrèman ti balans nan %{balance} %{currency}. Si ou kontinye, yo pral kantite lajan sa a dwe voye tounen nan konpayi an anvan yo TrustLine ou efase.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: te balans pousyè ou te voye tounen nan konpayi an. TrustLine a kapab kounye a ka retire li.
asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Ajoute yon siy nan kont XRP Ledger ou a ap ogmante XRP Ledger ou fè respekte kont rezève pa %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: Sa a siy pa ka retire nan kont ou. Emeteur la swa te ajoute anviwònman espesifik pou siy sa a oswa kont yo pa byen configuré.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Rippling pa etenn pou Liy Trust sa a, si ou pa konnen ki sa sa a ak / oswa sa a se pa sou objektif, tanpri mete ajou anviwònman sa a yo anpeche potansyèl pèt nan %{token} marqueur
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: This TrustLine has a limit of zero (0) configured, meaning others cannot send this token to you: you can only hold the token. To be able to receive this token as well, Xaman can update your TrustLine to remove the zero (0) TrustLine limit.
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / Xaman does not endorse any token or token issuer. You should only proceed if you trust the token issuer.
In case of questions or problems regarding the token (TrustLine) you will need to contact the token issuer.

Continue at your own risk.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard
asset.unableToLoadListOfTokens: Unable to load the list of tokens!

exchange.doYouWantToExchange: Èske ou sèten ou vle echanj %{payAmount} %{payCurrency} pou %{getAmount} %{getCurrency}?
exchange.failedExchange: Pa kapab chanje kounye a akòz mank lajan likid sikile, oswa pousantaj echanj mete ajou.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: Pa gen ase lajan likid sikile, pa ka echanj kounye a!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: Gen likidite relativman ba. Ou ka toujou kontinye, men ou ka pa jwenn pi bon pousantaj pou tout echanj ou!
exchange.theMaxAmountYouCanExchangeIs: Kantite maksimòm ou ka chanje a se %{spendable} %{currency}
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: Si ou vle kreye yon òf pou ekzekisyon nan yon nivo pri mande, ou ka itilize 3rd pati Xaman pèmèt XRP Toolkit aplikasyon pou kreye yon lòd limit.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: Kantite lajan an pa ka chanje: pa gen ase òf ki disponib sou Echanj desantralize a.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: Kantite lajan an pa ka chanje: ki baze sou mank de òf sou echanj la desantralize, ou pa ta kapab chanje li tounen.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: Diferans nan pri ant vann ak achte ofri a twò wo.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: Echanj pousantaj la pral move jan pa gen ase (bon) ofri sou echanj la desantralize.
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: Echanj pousantaj la pral move si ou ta eseye echanj tounen, menm jan pa gen ase (bon) ofri sou Echanj la desantralize.
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the XRP Ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changes while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please continue only if you accept this.

scan.scannedQRIsNotAccountAddress: Kòd QR eskane pa gen yon adrès %{nativeAsset} valab!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainAccountAddre: Done yo presse-papiers pa gen ladan adrès valab %{nativeAsset}!
scan.scannedQRIsNotXamanPayload: Kòd QR eskane se pa yon chaj Xaman!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXamanPayload: Done presse-papiers yo pa gen chaj Xaman valab!
scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: Kòd QR sa a pa gen enfòmasyon nou ta atann!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotWhatWeExpect: Done yo presse-papiers se pa sa nou espere!
scan.invalidQRTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Kòd QR ki pa valab (pou Xaman), eseye yon nouvo oswa eseye ankò
scan.invalidClipboardDateTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Done presse-papiers ki pa valab (pou Xaman), eseye yon nouvo oswa eseye ankò

payload.payloadHandledByAnotherClient: Chaj manyen pa yon lòt kliyan
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: Chaj sa a te deja siyen oswa rejte. Tanpri repete pwosesis ki te pwodwi demann lan, epi eskane nouvo demann lan.
payload.payloadExpired: Chaj sa a ekspire. Tanpri repete pwosesis ki te pwodwi demann lan, epi eskane nouvo demann lan.
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Envalid oswa manke pate tranzaksyon siyen
payload.unexpectedErrorOccurred: Erè inatandi ki te fèt, referans %{reference}
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: Chaj la valab, epi yo pral otomatikman rejte.
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: Pral inyore demann lan epi fèmen.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Pa ase lajan likid pou voye peman sa a.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Pa kapab verifye echanj pousantaj lajan an. Tanpri asire w ke ou byen konekte ak entènèt la
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Kapab jwenn frè rezo a, tanpri asire w ke ou konekte ak ne XRPL la
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: Yon chèk ka sèlman pwan si kont destinasyon Tcheke a prezan nan Xaman nan mòd li / ekri (oswa kle regilye).
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Kapab jwenn chèk objè. Tanpri asire w ke ou konekte nan ne XRPL la
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Kapab jwenn objè a Tcheke. Tanpri asire w ke chèk la egziste sou XRP Ledger la.
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: Yon chèk (ki pa ekspire) kapab sèlman anile pa kont lan ki te kreye li oswa kont destinasyon an.
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Remak: lè efase kont XRP Ledger ou epi voye balans ki rete a nan yon echanj, asire w ke echanj destinasyon an sipòte depo lè l sèvi avèk tranzaksyon AccountDelete. Se pa tout echanj fè, ki rezilta nan yon pwosedi sipò ak echanj la jwenn lajan ou kredite nan kont ou
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
Trade at your own risk! The token you are about to trade **has not been vetted**.

Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you trade this token, you may not be able to sell it back. You are potentially putting your assets/savings at risk!
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedNativeAssetWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming %{nativeAsset} (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError:
This payload is not valid on the network you are connected with.

Please switch to %{network} and try again.
payload.pathDryError:
The transaction didn't work because funds couldn't be moved between the two accounts, or could not be moved at the requested exchange rate.

This might be because the two accounts involved don't have a connection (TrustLine) that allows them to exchange money with each other, or the transaction didn't work because there wasn't enough money available to move between the two accounts.
payload.tecPartialError: The transaction didn't go through because there weren't enough tokens available to send the complete amount at the requested exchange rate between the two accounts.

errors.unableToLoadTermOfService: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Terms of Service
errors.unableToLoadChangeLogs: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Change Logs
